title: Fugitive Romance: The Fictional Memoir of a Hollywood Screenwriter
description: A gut-wrenching betrayal sets our young hero on a journey from Philadelphia to New York to LaLaLand, a rollercoaster quest for love, recognition, and financial success. He bumps and weaves his way through a maze of delicious, dangerous women and ruthless power brokers to the cliffâ€™s edge of his own self-destruction. Can anyone help him survive the dog-eat-dog world of show business? Can he overcome his addictions and find happiness? You won't know until the very end, an end worth waiting for.
author: Harry Castle
